short_description: itps is a paper & cardboard products supplier based in appen, germany.
long_description: we are an owner-managed company with more than 30 years of experience in the tea industry. our expertise and passion for tea is at the centre of everything we do, and we pride ourselves on developing individual concepts that reflect your brand. we offer a comprehensive range of full-service solutions, from tea packaging to the development of customised solutions. our aim is to understand your individual needs and help you present your unique brand. we attach great importance to environmentally friendly materials and sustainable packaging solutions. that is our slogan: there is no standard with us. contact us today to find out more about our extensive range of tea packaging options and our customised solutions. together we create unique tea experiences and strengthen your brand. itps gmbh stands for first-class quality and leading expertise in tea packaging. we offer a variety of first-class services to meet your needs. we offer you comprehensive packaging concepts and customised private label solutions for your products.
business_tags: private label | shelf life extension | tea packeting
generated_description: teegesellschaft nord mbh & co. kg is a company based in appen, schleswig-holstein, specializing in the tea trade and tea packaging. with over 30 years of experience, the company offers a comprehensive range of full-service solutions, including the development of customized tea packaging. kg emphasizes quality, using first-class raw materials and sustainable packaging materials. the company provides various packaging options, from classic formats to innovative and unique solutions, and serves customers worldwide. their services also include warehousing, logistics, and order picking, ensuring efficient management of goods and stock.
